info.description: Pin Access Service provides an API through which agency users can share information about their customers (end-indureds) with representatives of those customers who are not users in Titan.
info.title: Pin Access Service Service API

post.description: Create the Collaboration specified within the body of this request.  The created Collaboration will be returned.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: newCollaborationV1
parameters.description: A new Collaboration to be created

post.summary: Post to get resources associated with a Collaboration by Collaboration ID
post.description: Post to get resources associated with a Collaboration by Collaboration ID. The body of the request should include the authentication credentials for the Collaboration's resources.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: collaborationId
parameters.description: collaborationId

parameters.name: credentialV1
parameters.description: Credentials to authenticate the request

put.summary: Update resources associated with a Collaboration by Collaboration ID
put.description: Update resources associated with a Collaboration by Collaboration ID. The body of the request should include the authentication credentials for the Collaboration's resources.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: collaborationId
parameters.description: ID of the Collaboration

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: Request Body; Collaboration to be updated

get.description: Retrieves the Collaboration specified by the id provided.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Collaboration to get

put.description: Update the Collaboration specified by the id provided in the URL. The updated Collaboration will be returned.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Collaboration to replace

parameters.name: newCollaborationV1
parameters.description: A Collaboration to replace the existing Collaboration

patch.description: Patch the Collaboration  specified by the id provided in the URL. The updated Collaboration will be returned.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Collaboration to update

parameters.name: patch
parameters.description: A JSON Patch to update an existing Collaboration

sharedResourceMap.description: Map of {resourceType: {resourceID : SharedResourceV1}} that are included in the Collaboration.

CollaborationResourcesV1.description: This model describes a collection of resources provided to an end-insured's representative for review.

signed.description: Indicates end user is signing the Collaboration.

updateMap.description: Map of lists of resources to update.

customerId.description: Id of the Customer referenced by the Collaboration

producerId.description: Id of the User which created the Collaboration

collaborationEmailId.description: The ID of the email that was sent to the collaboratorEmail address

collaborationEmailSentOn.description: When the email was sent to the collaboratorEmail address

collaboratorEmail.description: Email of the individual invited to the Collaboration

completedOn.description: When the Collaboration was completed by the invitee

sharedResources.description: Descriptions of the resources being collaborated on

updatedOn.description: When the Collaboration was last modified

CollaborationV1.description: This model describes a new or existing collaboration.

EmailPasscodeCredentialV1.description: This model describes auth credentials for a request for resources.

error.description: This field will contain information about the error if one occurred

requestId.description: The unique ID of this request.

spanId.description: The unique ID of the span.

traceId.description: The unique ID of the trace.

traceId.description: The unique ID of the trace.
